author: trent_vanepps
content:
Announcing the 1559 Wallet Interfaces Call - if you are part of a wallet team and would like to join, please DM me!

üìÜ  Wed. May 26 at 13:00 UTC (9:00 ET)
‚è∞  1 hour

Leading up to the London Upgrade (~July 14) and 1559, we'd like to get the leading wallets in Ethereum together to discuss upcoming changes, including JSON RPC and how to communicate changes to users.

Agenda here: https://github.com/ethereum/pm/issues/323
